Equation: ATP [c] + CoA [c] + acetate [c] ⇒ AMP [c] + PPi [c] + acetyl-CoA [c]
ATP [m] + CoA [m] + acetate [m] ⇒ AMP [m] + PPi [m] + acetyl-CoA [m]
CoA [c] + acetyl adenylate [c] ⇒ AMP [c] + H+ [c] + acetyl-CoA [c]
ATP [c] + H+ [c] + acetate [c] ⇒ PPi [c] + acetyl adenylate [c]
CoA [m] + NAD+ [m] + pyruvate [m] ⇒ CO2 [m] + NADH [m] + acetyl-CoA [m]
H2O [c] + NADP+ [c] + acetaldehyde [c] ⇒ 2 H+ [c] + NADPH [c] + acetate [c]
H2O [m] + NAD+ [m] + acetaldehyde [m] ⇒ 2 H+ [m] + NADH [m] + acetate [m]
H+ [c] + NADPH [c] + O2 [c] + ethanol [c] ⇒ 2 H2O [c] + NADP+ [c] + acetaldehyde [c]
